text:
5th-7th March
‚Ä¢ Found out one issue in the user card
‚Ä¢ Took up a task to redesign the user organization dashboard
‚Ä¢ Raised 2 PRs which fix both the issues
‚Ä¢ Made the design mobile responsive for both features
Next
‚Ä¢ Will try to find out more frontend issues in care_fe
‚Ä¢ Fix atleast 3-4 issues in the next week
‚Ä¢ Try to take up any task given by the members

May 12th, 2025
‚Ä¢ PR Merged: Fixed the alignment issue in PrintPreview
‚Ä¢ Working on a newly assigned issue #12232
Next
‚Ä¢ Make changes on a previous PR
‚Ä¢ Create PR for the above mentioned issue
‚Ä¢ Go through Django Docs and Plugins

May 13, 14
‚Ä¢ Raised PR #12302, still making changes in it
‚Ä¢ Started DjangoForAll course. Completed L1
‚Ä¢ Attended the GSoC meet for contributors
Next
‚Ä¢ Continue with Django course
‚Ä¢ Explore BE docs
‚Ä¢ Work on finding and solving more FE issues

May 15
‚Ä¢ Completed DjangoForAll L2, L3 and parts of L4
‚Ä¢ Completed assignments (some pending for review)
‚Ä¢ Started learning about FHIR
Next
‚Ä¢ Continue with Django course
‚Ä¢ Read FHIR docs and its use in the project

May 16
‚Ä¢ Learnt about views, templates, databases, apps, models and migrations in Django
‚Ä¢ Completed L4 of DjangoForAll course
‚Ä¢ Explored HL7 FHIR page to find most important topics for the project
Next
‚Ä¢ Make changes to pending PRs
‚Ä¢ Continue with Django course
‚Ä¢ Start the Clinical Module of FHIR

May 17
‚Ä¢ Learnt about ORMs, relationships, Forms, auth in Django
‚Ä¢ Completed L4 and L5 of the course
‚Ä¢ AllergyTolerance, Condition and Procedure completed in FHIR R5
Next
‚Ä¢ Continue with DjangoForAll course
‚Ä¢ Continue with FHIR R5 docs

May 19
‚Ä¢ Completed parts of L7 of DjangoForAll course
‚Ä¢ Read about CarePlan in FHIR R5 and looked at other resources
‚Ä¢ Explored the EMR implementation docs and went through different features
Next
‚Ä¢ Continue DjangoForAll course and work with Django
‚Ä¢ Continue reading FHIR R5 docs

May 21
‚Ä¢ Completed L7 in DjangoForAll course and started L8
‚Ä¢ Finished reading about FamilyMemberHistory and AdverseEvent in FHIR R5 docs
‚Ä¢ Created plan to finish all material in the upcoming week
Next
‚Ä¢ Try to finish the django course
‚Ä¢ Continue reading the FHIR docs

May 22
‚Ä¢ Completed L8 of DjangoForAll course
‚Ä¢ Read about Goal, CareTeam, DetectedIssue, and ClinicalImpression in FHIR R5 docs
‚Ä¢ Read about relationships between various FHIR resources and how they are used
Next
‚Ä¢ Continue DjangoForAll and FHIR docs
‚Ä¢ Finish FHIR R5 docs
‚Ä¢ Learn about Backend Plugs

May 23
‚Ä¢ Finally Completed the DjangoForAll course
‚Ä¢ Read about ServiceRequest & VisionPerception in FHIR docs
Next
‚Ä¢ Finish FHIR R5 docs
‚Ä¢ Read about BE plugs
‚Ä¢ Read about the Nutritional Module in FHIR
‚Ä¢ Explore the EMR implementation docs of CARE

May 24
‚Ä¢ Read about the remaining resources in FHIR R5
‚Ä¢ Read the Nutritional Module in FHIR and got to know about NutritionOrder, NutritionIntake and NutritionProduct
‚Ä¢ Finally completed reading of FHIR docs
Next
‚Ä¢ Learn about BE Plugs
‚Ä¢ Explore EMR implementation in CARE
‚Ä¢ Practice Django

June 4-6
‚Ä¢ connected with mentors and discussed features & workflows
‚Ä¢ researched how diet management module can be integrated into the CARE system
‚Ä¢ read about the existing resources in CARE, the billing system and other ongoing features
‚Ä¢ explored the FHIR resources and their fields which are relevant for this project
‚Ä¢ compiled a document explaining all features, workflows, and implementation

June 18-19
‚Ä¢ Added labels and markings for workflows in the figma designs
‚Ä¢ Finished writing about the models which will be required for the project
Next
‚Ä¢ Get feedback for the figma designs
‚Ä¢ Iterate on the model designs with mentors

25-26 June
‚Ä¢ Went through changes in models reviewed by Yaswanth.
‚Ä¢ Checked the fields present in NO, NP & NI which best fit the current implementation plan.
‚Ä¢ Read about Location, Services and HealthcareService.
‚Ä¢ Checked which FHIR resources can be used to reduce number of new models.
Next
‚Ä¢ Go through necessary APIs to fetch data.
‚Ä¢ Reread about ChargItem, ChargeItemDefinition, Invoice and Account.
‚Ä¢ Look at backend implementation of quantity, allergens & healthcareService.
‚Ä¢ Go through FHIR docs of the necessary resources.

June 27th
‚Ä¢ Went through more FHIR docs (ValueSets, status, NO).
‚Ä¢ Went through backend APIs and implementations.
‚Ä¢ Updated the document for the models.
‚Ä¢ Designed new schemas for Nutrition Module based on the feedback.
Next
‚Ä¢ Go through docs for CI, CID, Invoice.
‚Ä¢ Billing Integration with Diet module.

June 28th
‚Ä¢ Went through documentation of ChargeItem, ChargeItemDefinition, Invoice and Account
Next
‚Ä¢ Go through FE and BE implementation of the above
‚Ä¢ Document how billing integration could be done

June 30th
‚Ä¢ Made a document for billing integration in the diet management module
Next
‚Ä¢ Get feedback on the above
‚Ä¢ Move on to next milestones

July 1st
‚Ä¢ Implemented the feedback on models and bills
‚Ä¢ Discussion with mentors on previous work and what to do next
Next
‚Ä¢ Setup the project
‚Ä¢ Create the models for the module

July 2nd
‚Ä¢ Decided the structure for the plug (frontend + backend)
‚Ä¢ Setup the project and initialized the backend
Next
‚Ä¢ Create models in backend and communicate with mentors

July 3rd
‚Ä¢ Cloned care_hello repo and started working on top of it.
‚Ä¢ Updated the boilerplate code to match the project.
‚Ä¢ Created nutritional models and pushed changes
Next
‚Ä¢ Create billing models

July 4th
‚Ä¢ System ran into a filesystem error, so i couldn't do much
‚Ä¢ Tried integrating the plugin with the care backend system
Next
‚Ä¢ Fix my system and get back to work

July 5th
‚Ä¢ Fixed my system and got back to work
‚Ä¢ Pushed changes in models and migrations
‚Ä¢ Discussion with Yaswanth regarding the billing models and its integration with the nutritional models.
Next
‚Ä¢ Go through labs branch of FE and BE and understand how billing is working.
‚Ä¢ Work on billing based on feedback

July 7
‚Ä¢ Explored labs branch in the backend
‚Ä¢ Looked into the models and spec for ChargeItemDefinition
‚Ä¢ Looked for the workflows in ServiceRequest for billing integration
Next
‚Ä¢ Further look into backend billing implementation for ServiceRequest
‚Ä¢ Figure out workflow for CI generation and how it is referenced in an Invoice
‚Ä¢ Look into the corresponding frontend

July 8th
‚Ä¢ Inspected backend billing implementation in ServiceRequest (labs)
‚Ä¢ Went through viewsets, specs, and models for various emr resources
‚Ä¢ Understood billing workflow and functions used
Next
‚Ä¢ Inspect more functions in the viewsets
‚Ä¢ Design similar flow for diet plug

July 9th
‚Ä¢ Inspected more billing related functions in the lab branch
‚Ä¢ Understood how price is being set for the items
‚Ä¢ Looked a bit into how same can be done with nutritional fields
Next
‚Ä¢ Continue exploring and understanding labs fe & be

July 10th
‚Ä¢ üéß with Yaswanth
‚Ä¢ Got to know about the billing flow in labs and pharmacy
‚Ä¢ Went through labs backend again
Next
‚Ä¢ Go through docs for the existing plugs
‚Ä¢ Start working on the frontend

July 11th
‚Ä¢ Went through some docs only, couldn't get much work done
Next
‚Ä¢ Setup frontend and start working on it

July 12th
‚Ä¢ Explored other plugs in care and their frontend implementations
‚Ä¢ Setup frontend repo for diet plug
‚Ä¢ Started working on designs and frontend pages
Next
‚Ä¢ Continue working on the frontend

July 13-14
‚Ä¢ Travelling on the weekend üöâ
‚Ä¢ Added reusable components like navbar, buttons
‚Ä¢ Tried implementing different designs in the frontend for Diet
‚Ä¢ Explored other frontend plugs to take inspiration
Next
‚Ä¢ Work on dashboards for specific roles
‚Ä¢ Make frontend based on the workflow

July 15-16:
‚Ä¢ Submitted midterm evaluation form for GSoC
‚Ä¢ Finished dashboard for dietician
‚Ä¢ Added meal requests page with card and list views
‚Ä¢ Sent a demo video for work progress to mentors.
Next
‚Ä¢ Go through manifest file of other backend plugs and hook diet plug correctly
‚Ä¢ Continue working on diet frontend

July 17th
‚Ä¢ fixed manifest file for frontend
‚Ä¢ configured diet fe plug to work correctly with care_fe
‚Ä¢ discussion and feedback from Amjith & Yaswanth
Next
‚Ä¢ implement dietician backend routes

July 18th:
‚Ä¢ updated nutritional models
‚Ä¢ created routes for dietician - getting orders and creating meals
‚Ä¢ shared an error with Amjith & Yaswanth, trying to fix it
Next
‚Ä¢ Continue working on routes

July 19th
‚Ä¢ created routes for canteens to view orders and update the statuses
‚Ä¢ created route for staff/nurse to log food intake
‚Ä¢ created route for returning all NOs related to an encounter
Next
‚Ä¢ Go back to college ‚ö∞Ô∏è

July 22nd
‚Ä¢ üéß with Yaswanth to fix error in the plug
‚Ä¢ fixed docker container errors and pushed the code
‚Ä¢ attended weekly call
‚Ä¢ worked on frontend of diet plug for the routes present in backend
Next
‚Ä¢ Finish frontend work
‚Ä¢ Test backend route
‚Ä¢ Fix errors for the plug

July 23rd
‚Ä¢ Updated encounter tab for NO in the frontend and connected with backend
‚Ä¢ Made migrations in database and small fixes in backend
‚Ä¢ Started testing of backend routes for NO creation and viewing NO for an encounter
Next
‚Ä¢ Finish basic frontend implementation
‚Ä¢ Test routes
‚Ä¢ Connect fe and be

July 24th
‚Ä¢ Added frontend for dietician, canteen and intake logging
‚Ä¢ Added fetching data from frontend and creation logic
‚Ä¢ Debugging of backend code and made small fixes
Next
‚Ä¢ Testing backend routes
‚Ä¢ Testing complete workflow from frontend

July 25th
‚Ä¢ Replaced drf serializers with pydantic specs in the backend
‚Ä¢ Worked on configuring the services for the frontend
‚Ä¢ Came across a lot of bugs and solved some ;-;
‚Ä¢ Tested fe and be, worked on integrating them
Next
‚Ä¢ Testing and debugging

July 26th
‚Ä¢ revamped backend logic and made it work correctly
‚Ä¢ added a route for creating NP
‚Ä¢ tested backend and all routes are functioning as expected (finally)
‚Ä¢ fixed frontend service components and made apis simpler
‚Ä¢ tested frontend pages
Next
‚Ä¢ finish the frontend and fix bug of patient not loading in services
‚Ä¢ test the complete workflow

July 28th
‚Ä¢ added uuid fields in necessary places and completed intake logging
‚Ä¢ tested backend routes, v1 logic completed
‚Ä¢ simplified fetching logic in the frontend
‚Ä¢ tried fixing api, build and cors errors

July 29th
‚Ä¢ Discussion with Yaswanth to solve development, config, and port issues
‚Ä¢ üéß with Yaswanth & Amjith to solve the errors and explain what I've been working on
‚Ä¢ Fixed nutrition order tab in encounter section to fetch nutrition orders correctly

July 30th
‚Ä¢ Slow day, had many classes in college
‚Ä¢ Refactoring of frontend code to move components into correct places.
‚Ä¢ Discussion with Yaswanth to fix issues and plan for next tasks.
‚Ä¢ Figured out NP creation format for frontend
July 31st
‚Ä¢ Fixed NP form rendering
‚Ä¢ Added list, view, edit and create pages for NP creation
‚Ä¢ Fixing bugs in various places
‚Ä¢ Sent video to mentors showing the flow and current bugs in NP creation

August 1st
‚Ä¢ fixed ts errors in NP tab, completed flow for it and tested all routes on fe
‚Ä¢ recorded and sent of video NP list, create, view and edit to mentors.
‚Ä¢ went through care_fe codebase for encounter tab implementations and questionnaire setup
‚Ä¢ started working on NO creation under Encounter Nutrition Order tab.
Next
‚Ä¢ fix params errors
‚Ä¢ fix plug tailwind so that it doesn't interfere with care_fe tailwind
‚Ä¢ complete NO creation on fe

August 2nd
‚Ä¢ went through service request questionnaire, and how different questionnaires are rendered
‚Ä¢ added button in encounter nutrition order to redirect to questionnaire form
‚Ä¢ made nutrition order questionnaire page
‚Ä¢ asked this doubt in care_engineering -> here
Next
‚Ä¢ configure fe to render NO questionnaire correctly
‚Ä¢ solve tailwind issues
‚Ä¢ test the flow, make fixes and get feedback

August 3rd
‚Ä¢ went through questionnaire files to see how different forms are getting rendered.
‚Ä¢ made minor changes in NO questionnaire, to try and get it to work.
Next
‚Ä¢ fix tailwind issues.
‚Ä¢ get NO questionnaire to work correctly.

August 4th
‚Ä¢ looked into questionnaire files as suggested by Yaswanth
‚Ä¢ testing NO questionnaire with hard-coded values, worked correctly
‚Ä¢ still trying to figure out how to render questionnaire from plug
‚Ä¢ added tailwind containers and working on fixing the issue with plug
Next
‚Ä¢ complete NO questionnaire
‚Ä¢ fix tailwind
‚Ä¢ move onto canteen services

August 5th
‚Ä¢ went through PluginEngine, pluginTypes, StructuredFormData, QuestionnaireForm and other plugin & questionnaire files to understand how questionnaires are getting rendered and how plugins are being used here.
‚Ä¢ created a form in encounter nutrition order tab to create NO and pushed the changes
‚Ä¢ had more discussions on the same
‚Ä¢ attended weekly review call
Next
‚Ä¢ work on the same based on feedback from Yaswanth

August 6th
‚Ä¢ worked on NO questionnaire issue as per feedback, still going through files and making changes
‚Ä¢ made changes in pluginTypes.ts & QuestionInput.tsx to support questionnaire rendering
‚Ä¢ made the questionnaire render on /questionnaire/nutrition_order
‚Ä¢ fixed bugs and solved issues
Next
‚Ä¢ make the NO fields render on the questionnaire page

August 7th
‚Ä¢ Explored the services page.
‚Ä¢ Went through the workflow of a service (pathalogy lab) and tried figuring out how I can implement the same in the diet plug.
‚Ä¢ Small fixes to fe for better UI.

August 8th
‚Ä¢ Iterated through multiple approaches to integrate NO creation with the questionnaire page.
‚Ä¢ Went through handlers.ts to understand the flow and how questionnaires are being rendered.
Next
‚Ä¢ Finish NO questionnaire page
‚Ä¢ Send demo video for review

August 9th
‚Ä¢ Hardcoded values in necessary places of care_fe to facilitate the rendering of NO questionnaire.
‚Ä¢ Got the NO form to render along with the questionnaire.
‚Ä¢ Completed NO creation in frontend.
‚Ä¢ Fixed linting errors and bugs.
Next
‚Ä¢ Canteen frontend for updating and completing orders.

August 10th
‚Ä¢ fixed params in all components and removed placeholders from them.
‚Ä¢ added nutrition product item under settings
‚Ä¢ made changes in care_fe so that the above functionality works
‚Ä¢ worked on the tailwind issue

August 11th
‚Ä¢ Recorded and sent a video of the updates I've made, to my mentors
‚Ä¢ Discussed what needs to be done next with the mentors
‚Ä¢ Explored pathology lab in services and started working on canteen dashboard

August 12th
‚Ä¢ added new internal_type in HealthcareService to include food and made the corresponding fe changes.
‚Ä¢ added Food Service -> Canteen Orders navigation item in location navbar and also added a button to take user from services page to location's canteen orders page.
‚Ä¢ edited LocationLayout.tsx to use a PLUGIN_Component for /nutrition_orders route which renders the LocationCanteenDashboard component from the care_diet_fe plug.
‚Ä¢ created LocationCanteenDashboard component which shows the nutrition orders for a particular location (canteen) and updated manifest.
‚Ä¢ made some changes in backend to make sure the above functionality works correctly.
‚Ä¢ fixed linting errors in multiple places.
Next
‚Ä¢ test canteen dashboard.
‚Ä¢ create the intake logging fe components.

August 13th
‚Ä¢ created intake logging component for nurses/staff.
‚Ä¢ added NO listing, pre-populated forms for logging, consumption status updates and historical view of all logs.
‚Ä¢ updated APIs for the same and integrated it with the BE.
‚Ä¢ added location selection in nutrition order questionnaire.
‚Ä¢ completion of main functionality.
Next
‚Ä¢ test the complete flow and fix the bugs
‚Ä¢ fix questionnaire issue

August 14th
‚Ä¢ changed NO creation logic and added support for multiple NP.
‚Ä¢ still debugging the error for creating NO questionnaire.
‚Ä¢ design fixes, fixed small bugs and tested workflow.
Next
‚Ä¢ change be logic to correctly display NP names in Canteen Orders and Intake Logging

August 15th
‚Ä¢ worked on fixing the display of NP in canteen dashboard and intake logs
‚Ä¢ fixed more linting and formatting errors
‚Ä¢ updated NutritionProductForm to be correctly used for editing and creating
‚Ä¢ sent a video demonstrating the complete diet flow to mentors for review

August 17th
‚Ä¢ fixed the display of patient names, locations and NPs in canteen dashboard and logging page
‚Ä¢ made changes in the backend to support fetching of related data
‚Ä¢ added sheet in canteen dashboard to view full details of the NO
‚Ä¢ made ui changes

18th August
‚Ä¢ Still debugging the error in NO questionnaire.
‚Ä¢ Worked on implementing the page to view past orders and filter them by type

19th August
‚Ä¢ Discussion with mentors about change of plans and implementing the rest of the features.
‚Ä¢ Moved the intake logging feature from location services to encounter nutrition order tab.
‚Ä¢ Added "View Details" to see the details about NO and NI related to it.
‚Ä¢ Updated the backend of intake log to support filtering by NO.
‚Ä¢ Submitted a document regarding the timeline of implementation i am planning to do, to my mentors.

20th August
‚Ä¢ added intake log details under Nutrition Order Encounter tab and changed fetching logic from individual NO to encounter.
‚Ä¢ went through different plugs to understand how their tailwind is working and understood how it is working for micro frontends.
‚Ä¢ made styling changes in index.css and other parts of the fe plug.
‚Ä¢ made changes in care_fe and care_diet_fe plug to make NO questionnaire work correctly, but still getting errors.

21st August
‚Ä¢ fixed tailwind bleeding issue and fixed styling in all components of the plug.
‚Ä¢ tried solving the issue in NO questionnaire where questionnaire response remains empty always.
‚Ä¢ created allergyApi.ts on frontend to fetch patient's allergy history from allergy-intolerance system
‚Ä¢ updated NO questionnaire to show the corresponding allergy warnings
‚Ä¢ created valuesetApi.ts to get the data from system-allergy-code valueset and updated the NP creation frontend to now show the list of allergens which is fetched using this api.
‚Ä¢ updated models for NO and NP to now store the allergy and allergens respectively, in the correct format.
Next
‚Ä¢ fix the errors encountered in some places
‚Ä¢ solve my query regarding the questionnaire

22nd August
‚Ä¢ went through other possible approaches for NO questionnaire
‚Ä¢ sent the problem in NO questionnaire to mentors and discussion about testing
‚Ä¢ tested the new allergens and allergies fields added, by creating the corresponding items and tested the flow again
Next
‚Ä¢ fix NO questionnaire based on the feedback
‚Ä¢ billing integration in diet plugin

23rd August
‚Ä¢ added ChargeItem and ChargeItemDefinition fields in diet models for billing integration.
‚Ä¢ added the nutrition_order & nutrition_intake service resources to ChargeItemResourceOptions in care repo.
‚Ä¢ auto creation of ChargeItem when NO is created & accounts with status active whenever required.
‚Ä¢ linked ChargeItems to NO with status billable when they are created.
‚Ä¢ added checks and validation to prevent double billing.
‚Ä¢ updated the NP and Intake serializers to include the billing logic.
Next
‚Ä¢ complete the frontend for billing
‚Ä¢ fix bugs and errors

24th August
‚Ä¢ added billing related types in the care_diet_fe
‚Ä¢ created api routes for listing ChargeItemDefinitions and ChargeItems
‚Ä¢ updated NutritionProductForm to select CID
‚Ä¢ updated NutritionOrderCard to show billing information

25th August:
‚Ä¢ fixed the NO card to display nutrition and billing details.
‚Ä¢ worked on fixing the error caused when FE fetches data from CID api.
‚Ä¢ shared the details of the error in NO questionnaire to mentors.
‚Ä¢ tested the existing routes after making changes and worked on solving the bugs.

26th August:
‚Ä¢ shared the details of the error in NO questionnaire to mentors
‚Ä¢ made changes in NP form to display fields correctly and handle errors
‚Ä¢ went through final submission page for GSoC
‚Ä¢ worked on getting the final flow done

28th August
‚Ä¢ Went through feedback received from mentors on various issues
‚Ä¢ Understood how the questionnaire react state is working
‚Ä¢ Worked on fixing the NO questionnaire and created backend endpoints for handling batch requests.

29th August:
‚Ä¢ added endpoint in be for batch requests to be used by questionnaire
‚Ä¢ updated NO form to send values to questionnaire state and fixed it
‚Ä¢ fixed TS errors in the frontend and updated NP form
‚Ä¢ communicated with the QA team

30th August
‚Ä¢ Rebased local care_fe and care repos to have latest changes
‚Ä¢ Created draft PR in care_fe with links to fe & be plugs and changes to care_fe & care
‚Ä¢ Worked on creating a doc for the enhancements provided by Diet Management module, taking inspiration from previous CEPs
‚Ä¢ Created a GitHub repo for demonstrating all the work done during my GSoC project
